categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Mnesus was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire who created a number of biological experiments during his career. He owned several laboratories during the Cold War.

Mnesus was first mentioned in the Bioanalysis crew skill mission "A Sith Lord's Work" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. With Game Update 4.1, the mission was made available to both factions, and Mnesus changed to a scientist named Jav Mensor.
